courseDetails.title: Introduce yourself in PORTUGUESE (verbs "SER" & "ESTAR")
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering basic sentences with verbs "to be" and special vocabulary to describe people
targetAudiences: Beginners to Intermediate learners (Levels A1-B1)
Everyone who is looking for a crash course on how to introduce themselves in Portuguese
Everyone who wants to understand and review irregular verbs in Portuguese (particularly these 2 irregular verbs, that correspond to verb “to be” in English)
